text: jinsillo hananimkkeseoneun midneun jadeul-ege eunhyeleul bepusyeoss-euni geudeul jasin-eseo naon sadoleul geudeul sog-e bonaesyeossnola. geuneun geudeul-ege geubun-ui jingpyoleul nangsonghago geudeul-eul kkaekkeus-i hamyeo geudeul-ege seongseowa jihyeleul galeuchideola. jinsillo geudeul-eun ijeon-e bunmyeonghan banghwang sog-e iss-eossnola
